qas.question: Which name did Madonna adopted as her confirmation name?
Which disease did her mother passed away from?

answers.text: Detroit suburbs of Pontiac and Avon Township

qas.question: What was Madonna's mother's reaction to her questioning about her illness?

context: Upon being confirmed in 1966, she adopted <a0_0>Veronica<a0_0/> as a confirmation name. She was raised in the <a2_0>Detroit suburbs of Pontiac and Avon Township<a2_0/> (now Rochester Hills). Months before her mother died of <a1_0>breast cancer<a1_0/>, Madonna noticed changes in her behavior and personality, although she did not understand the reason. Her mother was at a loss to explain her medical condition, and often began to <a3_0>cry<a3_0/> when Madonna questioned her about it. Madonna later acknowledged that she had not grasped the concept of her mother dying.
